lang_des.chinesesimplified: 标准远距离抛投，追求最远距离。
lang_des.english: A standard long-distance cast for maximum range.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 收线配合短暂停顿，模仿游动休息。
lang_des.english: A retrieve with pauses, mimicking a swimming-resting cycle.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 保持竿身弯曲，持续施压消耗鱼体力。
lang_des.english: Maintains rod bend to apply constant pressure and tire the fish.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 精准引导鱼头方向，化解其冲力。
lang_des.english: Steers the fish's head to control its runs and turns.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 快速下压竿梢，应对鱼的突然下潜。
lang_des.english: A quick tip dip to absorb sudden dives and headshakes.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 爆发式强力拉竿，迅速将鱼带离障碍区。
lang_des.english: An explosive pull to quickly wrench the fish away from snags.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用枪柄竿增加<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>抛投距离
lang_des.english: Baitcast Rod: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Cast Distance

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用直柄竿增加<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>抛投距离
lang_des.english: Spinning Rod: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Cast Distance

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用伸缩竿增加<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>抛投距离
lang_des.english: Telescopic Rod: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Cast Distance

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 体力消耗下降<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>
lang_des.english: Stamina Cost: <color=#00FF00>-{0}</color>

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用水滴轮增加中鱼率<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>
lang_des.english: Baitcast Reel: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Hook-up Rate

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 摆动抛投，弧线精准入点。
lang_des.english: A cast for precise, arcing placement.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用纺车轮增加中鱼率<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>
lang_des.english: Spinning Reel: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Hook-up Rate

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 体力上限提升<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>
lang_des.english: Max Stamina: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用真饵增加中鱼率<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>
lang_des.english: Live Bait: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Hook-up Rate

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 使用拟饵增加中鱼率<color=#00FF00>+{0}</color>
lang_des.english: Artificial Lure: <color=#00FF00>+{0}</color> Hook-up Rate

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 低手侧抛，在障碍物下穿过。
lang_des.english: A low-profile cast to skip under overhangs.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 反手发力，在狭窄空间快速出竿。
lang_des.english: A quick, confined-space cast using a backhand motion.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 控制拟饵自然下沉，模仿濒死猎物。
lang_des.english: Mimics a dying prey with a controlled, natural sink.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 匀速收线，使拟饵直线游动。
lang_des.english: A steady retrieve for a straight-line lure movement.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 收线中带竿，使拟饵摇摆前进。
lang_des.english: Adds a wobbling motion to a straight retrieve.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 高频微抖，模仿受惊的小饵鱼
lang_des.english: High-frequency twitches mimic a panicking baitfish.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 大力抽竿，使拟饵突然窜动。
lang_des.english: Sharp rod pulls make the lure dart aggressively.

lang_des.chinesesimplified: 长按技能图标以持续生效
lang_des.english: Hold to Activate & Maintain
